title: thread about the Paris attacks got deleted.
body: which is fitting, considering the disgusting nature of some of the comments that were made attacking the OP for showing some sympathy, by making a notice thread like what is done in *every other forum on the goddamn internet* about disasters like this. For anyone wondering why the mods won't allow us to discuss "mature" topics such as politics, news, et cetera, those responsible for bashing Kiwi just for making the thread gave more than enough definitive proof.
